entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
